experience.work_done:
Worked on creating a customer support endpoint leveraging MS Graph API, lambda functions and email integration
– Worked on Restful API for admin showing user analytics like number of active users, total users
– Integrated API with Admin Dashboard created with Angular
– Worked with Angular, NestJS, Typescript, MongoDB, Gitlab, Postman

Worked on creating responsive React components using Material UI, and integrated with the backend system
– Created REST API endpoints along with authorization, and authentication with expressJS and MongoDB

projects.name: The Happy Store
projects.summary:
Android application created with Typescript, React Native, Expo, NestJS
– Backend built using NestJS, MongoDB, Typescript and hosted on render.com
– Payment integration using razorpay gateway
– Authentication is OTP-based using fast2sms service

projects.name: Spotify Playlist Generator
projects.summary:
Desktop application created with ElectronJS, ReactJS, and ExpressJS
– Creates an online playlist of your offline songs, present on your device without manually entering them one by one
– Uses OAuth for authentication and requires permission to read and modify your playlists

projects.name: Booklists
projects.summary:
Blog site created to write about all the books that I will read this year.
– Built with Python, Flask, SQLite

projects.name: BikeChain
projects.summary:
Decentralised bike rental system
– Smart Contract hosted on Goerli Test network, frontend application created with React

resume_review.summary: Sumrender Singh is a strong candidate for the Front End Development Internship. He has a solid understanding of frontend technologies like TypeScript, Angular, React, and React Native. His experience with NestJS and ExpressJS demonstrates his backend knowledge, which is valuable for full-stack development. He has also worked on projects involving containerization tools like Docker, which is a plus. His experience with Git and version control is evident from his work on various projects. However, his experience with AngularJS might be less relevant for this internship, which focuses on Angular 11+. Overall, Sumrender's skills and experience align well with the requirements of the internship.
